hero.title: Your first AI insurance assistant — chat and get real plans in seconds
hero.subtitle: Tell Briki what you need. Find the best insurance, analyze policies and compare personalized options without complications.

creation.title: Create Your Project Roadmap
creation.description: Tell me about your project idea and I'll help you create a detailed roadmap with the best tools and strategies.

placeholders.habit_app: I want to create a habit tracking app
placeholders.ecommerce: I need an e-commerce website for handmade products
placeholders.dashboard: I want to build an analytics dashboard

messages.ask_details: Great idea! What would you like to name your project, and can you give me a short description of what it will do?
messages.ask_name_only: Got it! What would you like to call this project?
messages.ask_description_only: Sounds great! Can you tell me a bit more about what this project will do?
messages.ask_both_again: I'd love to help you create a roadmap! Can you tell me your project name and a brief description of what it will do?
messages.confirm_details:
Perfect! So you're creating "{name}" - {description}. 

Shall I generate a detailed roadmap for this project?
messages.success: Excellent! I've created a comprehensive roadmap for {title}. You can see it on the right side of your screen. The roadmap includes {phases} phases to guide you through building your project.
messages.change_details: No problem! Please tell me the correct project name and description.
messages.casual_input: I'm here to help you create a project roadmap! Please tell me about your project idea - what do you want to build?
messages.unclear_input: I want to make sure I understand correctly. Could you please tell me the name of your project and what it will do?

roadmap.tooltip_check_task: Click to mark task as complete

placeholders.whatToBuild: What do you want to build with Briki AI?
placeholders.describeIdea: Describe your idea and I'll help create a roadmap...
placeholders.example1: For example: An AI-powered task management app...
placeholders.example2: Or: An e-commerce with personalized recommendations...

problems.title: Common Challenges with Insurance
problems.description: Many people need insurance but face these common obstacles. Briki helps you overcome them with clear explanations and personalized recommendations.

features.section_title: Smart insurance search. Real plans. Instant answers.
features.section_subtitle: Here's what Briki Insurance Assistant does for you — and why it matters.

prompt_builder.title: Natural Language Search
prompt_builder.description: Ask for insurance in plain language. No forms, no jargon — just tell Briki what you need.

confidence_advisor.title: Plan Comparison
confidence_advisor.description: Briki compares real insurance plans side-by-side so you can see coverage, costs, and benefits clearly.

result_analyzer.title: PDF Analysis
result_analyzer.description: Upload insurance documents and Briki explains what's covered, what's not, and what you should know.

smart_rephraser.title: Personalized Recommendations
smart_rephraser.description: Get insurance suggestions tailored to your age, health, family, and budget — not generic options.

features.ready_description: Join thousands of users who are already finding better insurance plans with Briki Insurance Assistant.

use_cases.title: See how people like you use Briki to find better insurance
use_cases.description: Discover real-life use cases that make insurance shopping simple and help you visualize yourself using the product.

who_its_for.title: Who is Briki Insurance Assistant for?
who_its_for.subtitle: If you need insurance but feel overwhelmed by options, complex forms, or confusing terms, Briki is designed specifically for you.

students.title: Young Professionals
students.description: Find affordable health insurance, life coverage, and travel protection without spending hours comparing plans.

creators.title: Families
creators.description: Get comprehensive family coverage, understand what's included, and find plans that protect everyone you love.

business.title: Small Business Owners
business.description: Find business insurance, employee benefits, and liability coverage that fits your budget and protects your company.

professionals.title: Seniors & Retirees
professionals.description: Navigate Medicare options, supplemental coverage, and long-term care insurance with clear explanations and recommendations.

assistant.title: Insurance Assistant
assistant.subtitle: Ask about coverage, compare policies, or analyze your documents
assistant.input_placeholder: Ask about coverage, compare policies, or analyze documents...
assistant.loading_subtitle: We're preparing everything to help you with your insurance...

compare: Which auto insurance offers better coverage?
analyze: Check if my policy covers this

plans.notFound: No recommended plans found for your request.
plans.planNotFoundError: Could not find the selected plan.
